page.title: 05TRAFFIC SURVEYS LONDON NW10
page.content: Taking Gladstone Park School as the central point, the surrounding roads were surveyed to try to find the quietest and busiest roads. {ROADS TIMES NUMBERS Geary Road 1400-1410 8 Helena Road 1400-1410 2 Lechmere Road 1420-1430 4 Walm Lane 1100-1110 98 Willesden Hg Rd 1100-1110 176 85 of these were{industrial.}We think that this was due to the building of a new supermarket on the High Road. We also did a traffic count for Sherrick Green Road as this is the school road. From{0850-0900}126 vehicles passed whilst 76 passed from{0930-0940.}We thought that the counts were very high considering it is a built-up area.This might be explained by the fact that many children come by car and people use this road to avoid the High Road.
